definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)

sentences.english: Mosquito bites can be prevented by spraying the body with a chemical containing DEET.
sentences.chinese: 蚊虫叮咬，可阻止含有避蚊胺喷洒化学物质的身体。

sentences.english: Sprays of liquid nitrogen freeze and kill the abnormal tissue, which sloughs off.
sentences.chinese: 用液氮喷洒冷冻，杀死异常组织，它会脱落。

sentences.english: Control of root mealy bugs is accomplished with soil drenches with an insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 根部粉蚧的控制是在土壤喷洒杀虫剂时完成的。

sentences.english: No, fragrance is formulated only to be applied to the skin.
sentences.chinese: 不行，香水是设计用来喷洒在皮肤上的。

sentences.english: The showerhead massage is the control that switches the water from a steady stream to a pulsating jet spray.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴喷头按摩是通过控制水流的脉动和喷洒来完成的。

sentences.english: You don't have to spray every year.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要每年喷洒这种细菌。

sentences.english: Do not spray over food or tableware.
In areas where insecticide is not sprayed, mosquitoes without the resistance gene do better.
sentences.chinese: 在不喷洒杀虫剂的地方，蚊子没有抗药基因反而好。

sentences.english: This muscle pain-relief spray is excellent for those hard to reach areas.
sentences.chinese: 本肌肉解痛喷洒剂是最适合这种难治的部位。

sentences.english: Spray the cleaner directly on the cloth to avoid streaking and getting the cleaner on the upholstery.
sentences.chinese: 将清洁剂直接喷洒在布上以防溢射碰到汽车内饰。

sentences.english: WHO put its authority behind the use of DDT for indoor residual spraying.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织支持使用滴滴涕进行室内残留喷洒。

sentences.english: Anti-mosquito oil is applied to black spots in rear lanes.
sentences.chinese: 灭蚊人员在后巷蚊患黑点喷洒蚊油。

sentences.english: Applying anti-mosquito oil at known black-spot breeding areas.
sentences.chinese: 灭蚊人员在蚊患黑点喷洒蚊油。

sentences.english: When spraying, do not aim spray nozzle at human body for spraying.
sentences.chinese: 喷洒作业时，不得将喷头对准人体喷施。

sentences.english: It is unclear just how effective this prevention measure is without the addition of a repellent.
sentences.chinese: 如果不喷洒蜱剂，该防护措施的实际效果，尚不明确。

sentences.english: Use it after washing your face. Spray and leave it until floral water dry into your skin.
sentences.chinese: 喷洒于脸部皮肤上直至花水被皮肤完全吸收。

definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
